book.synopsis: Packed with travel information, including listings, deals, and insider tips:CANDID LISTINGS of hundreds of places to eat, sleep, drink, and feel like a localRELIABLE MAPS to help you navigate Australia from the reefs to the OutbackEXPANDED COVERAGE of Melbourne and TasmaniaSTRAIGHT TALK from writers on their experiences and tips for improving your tripWORK AND VOLUNTEER OPPORTUNITIES all over AustraliaA GLOSSARY with all the authentic Aussie lingo you
